awards.recipient_name_raw: SAULT STE MARIE TRIBE OF CHIPPEWA INDIANS
awards.description:
DESCRIPTION:
THE PURPOSE OF THIS GRANT IS TO PROVIDE ASSISTANCE TO THE SAULT SAINTE MARIE TRIBE OF CHIPPEWA INDIANS IN ITS EFFORTS TO IMPLEMENT AIR QUALITY PROGRAMS THROUGHOUT THE TRIBAL LANDS.
ACTIVITIES:
THE RECIPIENT WILL IMPLEMENT ACTIVITIES WITHIN THE SCOPE OF THE CLEAN AIR ACT SECTION 103 PROGRAM, INCLUDING: 1) BUILD TRIBAL CAPACITY TO ADDRESS A WIDE RANGE OF AIR QUALITY ISSUES, 2) REVIEW AND COMMENT ON AIR QUALITY PERMITS THAT MAY AFFECT THE TRIBE, 3) IMPLEMENT AN INDOOR AIR QUALITY MONITORING AND EDUCATION PROGRAM, 4) OPERATE A NATIONAL TRENDS NETWORK SITE 5) CARRY OUT AN OUTREACH PROGRAM FOR THE TRIBAL COMMUNITY ON AIR QUALITY AND HEALTH IMPACTS, AND 6) DEVELOP AN EMISSIONS INVENTORY FOR TRIBAL LANDS.
OUTCOMES:
OUTCOMES INCLUDE INCREASED TRIBAL CAPACITY TO ADDRESS AIR QUALITY ISSUES, AND IMPROVED AIR QUALITY ON TRIBAL LANDS. INTENDED BENEFICIARIES: DIRECT BENEFICIARIES OF THIS PROGRAM INCLUDE TRIBAL RESIDENTS, WHO WILL HAVE IMPROVED AIR QUALITY AND REDUCED LOCALIZED POLLUTION. 
SUBRECIPIENT:
NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.

awards.recipient_name_raw: SAULT STE MARIE TRIBE OF CHIPPEWA INDIANS
awards.description:
DESCRIPTION:THE PURPOSE OF THIS GRANT IS TO PROVIDE ASSISTANCE TO THE SAULT SAINTE MARIE TRIBE OF CHIPPEWA INDIANS IN ITS EFFORTS TO IMPLEMENT AIR QUALITY PROGRAMS THROUGHOUT THE TRIBAL LANDS.
ACTIVITIES:THE RECIPIENT WILL IMPLEMENT ACTIVITIES WITHIN THE SCOPE OF THE CLEAN AIR ACT SECTION 103 PROGRAM, INCLUDING: 1) BUILD TRIBAL CAPACITY TO ADDRESS A WIDE RANGE OF AIR QUALITY ISSUES, 2) REVIEW AND COMMENT ON AIR QUALITY PERMITS THAT MAY AFFECT THE TRIBE, 3) IMPLEMENT AN INDOOR AIR QUALITY MONITORING AND EDUCATION PROGRAM, 4) OPERATE A NATIONAL TRENDS NETWORK SITE 5) CARRY OUT AN OUTREACH PROGRAM FOR THE TRIBAL COMMUNITY ON AIR QUALITY AND HEALTH IMPACTS, 6) DEVELOP A WILDFIRE SMOKE PREPARATION CODE, AND 7) DEVELOP A FINAL EMISSION INVENTORY ON EACH SAULT TRIBE RESERVATION.SUBRECIPIENT:NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.OUTCOMES:OUTCOMES INCLUDE INCREASED TRIBAL CAPACITY TO ADDRESS AIR QUALITY ISSUES, AND IMPROVED AIR QUALITY ON TRIBAL LANDS. DIRECT BENEFICIARIES OF THIS PROGRAM INCLUDE TRIBAL RESIDENTS, WHO WILL HAVE IMPROVED AIR QUALITY AND REDUCED LOCALIZED POLLUTION.
